column1: Applied Neuroscience Online | MSc, PG Dip
column5: Shape your mindsetExplore neuroscience in relation to mental health, disease and treatment with the world-renowned Institute of Psychiatry, Psychology & Neuroscience, 100% online. Discover the course today!This cutting-edge master's programme from King's College London is designed to help you develop a comprehensive understanding of the neuroscientific field and explore areas of applied neuroscience such as neuroimaging, and psychological and neurodevelopmental illnesses. From the research lab to marketing and games design - learn about the applications of this emerging science in real-world settings and understand the mechanisms and treatments of various diseases of the brain and nervous system.
